short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly grab all the images on the page and download them in the specified format. It also will supports image format conversion.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Image Craft Tool is a specialized tool designed for capturing images on a webpage, encompassing not only requested image resources but also SVG elements within the HTML. It supports the display of various image formats. It also supports the download of multiple image formats, and even facilitates batch downloading, and sorting images by file size and filtering by type.
